column1: #Text=Bolin says : " Ohh look , they have a mover poster of me .
#Text=Those are wanted posters , and there 's one for each of us .
#Text=" Wanted by Her Majesty , the Earth Queen , for crimes against the Kingdom . "
#Text=I 'm guessing this is because we took her airbenders .
#Text=" Korra says : " They were n't hers to keep !
#Text=I swear , if I see her pinchy little queen face again , I am going to ... " Asami says : " Uhh , guys ... We should get out of here .
